channel.title: Conferences on Peter Malmgren
channel.description: Recent content in Conferences on Peter Malmgren

item.title: Strangeloop 2018
item.description: Strangeloop 2018 is a conference held every year in St. Louis. It features speakers from academia, the software industry, and even a museum party at the City Museum held the night before the conference starts!

item.title: PWLConf 2018 Running Notes
item.description:
PWLConf 2018 Notes

PWLConf 2018 was one of the preconferences at Strangeloop 2018. Here are my notes for the conference. I left out the last talk, Stable Fluids, but if you find computer animation interesting I urge you to check it out.
